mechanics.defend_bonus: +2 to Defend with Fight or Athletics while wielding

special.name: Unbroken Shieldwall
special.effect: Negate up to 4 shifts of physical stress from an attack targeting you or an ally in your zone; create 'Shieldwall Stance' with 1 free invoke.

special.name: Stand Fast
special.effect: You may Create an Advantage with Fight instead of Command to represent disciplined shield-work; create 'No One Passes' with 1 free invoke (2 on SWS).

lore.notes: A Companions relic. Traditionally kept in Jorrvaskr or carried only in times of great need.
